name: SPCE
description:
You have just stolen a time manipulation device from a heavily guarded facility and are currently being chased through space. Fight off waves of security ships while using your new found device to your advantage in this endless bullet hell game. But be careful, time is very unstable in uneducated hands. 

Instructions:

Use WASD to move, H to fire, J to activate slow motion, K to activate picked up abilities.

Specifications:

Game should be runnable on any Windows Computer.
